text: Trouble is the debut Japanese studio album (second overall) by South Korean girl group EXID. It was released on April 3, 2019, by Tokuma Japan Communications. == Release == The album was released in two physical editions, including a regular and a limited edition, and as a digital download on April 3, 2019. == Commercial performance == Trouble debuted and peaked at number 12 on the Oricon Albums Chart and at number 23 on Billboard Japans Hot Albums. It also peaked at number 10 on Billboard Japans Top Albums Sales, with 4,831 physical copies sold in its first week. == Track listing == == Charts == {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" !Chart (2019) !Peak position |- ! scope="row"| Japan Hot Albums (Billboard) | 23 |- ! scope="row"| Japanese Albums (Oricon) | 12 |} == References == Category:EXID albums Category:Tokuma Shoten albums Category:2019 albums
title: Trouble (EXID album)
